movie.title: Full Metal Jacket
movie.plot: A two-segment look at the effect of the military mindset and war itself on Vietnam era Marines. The first half follows a group of recruits in boot camp under the command of the punishing Gunnery Sergeant Hartman. The second half shows one of those recruits, Joker, covering the war as a correspondent for Stars and Stripes, focusing on the Tet offensive.
movie.awards: Nominated for 1 Oscar. Another 8 wins & 13 nominations.
